comment: The wind turbine example really helps to understand the conceptual difference between v and w, velocity and angular velocity. What I really like about all your lectures is that you focus a lot on understanding the concepts, so that we can use them and the equations. You break everything down into the important components and steps correctly. Thank you for these amazing lectures!
Sure am! I will be adding more lecture to both physics 1 and physics 2 in the coming weeks.
